description: Get time slot details for shop flash sale

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Example (1611555555)

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to access the API. Valid for multiple use until expiration

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop api

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner, as per auth standards.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Indicate error if any error happened

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicate error details if any error happened

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: the start time of time slot

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: the end time of time slot
